mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.FLAG_ID as A_FLAG_ID, A.FLAG_TYPE as A_FLAG_TYPE, A.SITE_ID as A_SITE_ID, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert:
select ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT (ID, FLAG_ID, FLAG_TYPE, SITE_ID, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_ID = #{record.flagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_TYPE = #{record.flagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{record.updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_ID = #{flagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_TYPE = #{flagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select NVL(F.STATUS,'N') F_STATUS, NVL(E.Stauts,'O') E_STATUS, E.ENROLL_MODE ENROLL_MODE, A.ACTIVITY_ID as A_ACTIVITY_ID, A.TYPE as A_TYPE, A.FOLDER_ID as A_FOLDER_ID, A.NAME as A_NAME, A.OBJECT_DETAILS as A_OBJECT_DETAILS, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE, A.GRADE as A_GRADE, A.RELEASE_DATE as A_RELEASE_DATE, A.COMPLETE_NUMBER as A_COMPLETE_NUMBER, A.ONLINE_NUMBER as A_ONLINE_NUMBER, A.RELEASE_STAUTS as A_RELEASE_STAUTS, C.ATTACHMENT_ID as C_ATTACHMENT_ID, C.DESCRIPTION as C_DESCRIPTION from ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT D, ATY_ELEARNING B, CRS_COURSE_INFO C , ATY_ACTIVITY A LEFT JOIN ATY_ENROLL_LEARNER E ON A.ACTIVITY_ID=E.ACTIVITY_ID and E.User_Id=#{params.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND E.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' LEFT JOIN ATY_USER_ACTIVITY F ON F.USER_ID = #{params.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and A.ACTIVITY_ID = F.ACTIVITY_ID AND F.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' where D.SITE_ID = #{params.siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND D.FLAG_TYPE = #{params.flagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.TYPE = #{params.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RELEASE_STAUTS ='R' AND D.FLAG_ID = B.ID AND B.COURSE_ID = C.ID AND D.FLAG_ID=A.ACTIVITY_ID AND D.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' AND B.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' AND C.RECORD_STATUS = 'A'
AND A.NAME like #{params.activityFindName} escape '/'

select count(A.ACTIVITY_ID) from ATY_RECOMMEND_OBJECT D, ATY_ELEARNING B, CRS_COURSE_INFO C , ATY_ACTIVITY A LEFT JOIN ATY_ENROLL_LEARNER E ON A.ACTIVITY_ID=E.ACTIVITY_ID and E.User_Id=#{params.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND E.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' LEFT JOIN ATY_USER_ACTIVITY F ON F.USER_ID = #{params.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and A.ACTIVITY_ID = F.ACTIVITY_ID AND F.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' where D.SITE_ID = #{params.siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND D.FLAG_TYPE = #{params.flagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.TYPE = #{params.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RELEASE_STAUTS ='R' AND D.FLAG_ID = B.ID AND B.COURSE_ID = C.ID AND D.FLAG_ID=A.ACTIVITY_ID AND D.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' AND B.RECORD_STATUS = 'A' AND C.RECORD_STATUS = 'A'
AND A.NAME like #{params.activityFindName} escape '/'
